Q1 Highlights

It’s been another busy quarter for the Source Team.

Here’s a quick update on the first few months of 2024, including two launches, an exciting partnership announcement, our Mumbai trip highlights and more.

As always, please contact us if you have any further questions or queries.

New Launches

We have launched sites in Sheffield and Leeds - cities with large employers, offering vibrant social amenities, outstanding universities and convenient transport links.

Login to your Hub account for full details, including due diligence documents, financial illustrations and more.

Want to apply for a Hub account? Get in touch here.

Annual Report

2023 was a year of opportunity.

Read all about it in our latest annual report, which includes a summary of our investment opportunities, a spotlight section on upcoming areas and our rental performance highlights.

Download your copy here.

New Partnership

Last month we announced our partnership with Carbon Funding Consultants.

Carbon offer a range of financial solutions for private clients and large portfolio landlords. Each solution is tailor made to personal circumstances, with rationale for funding applications clearly explained.

With this partnership, our investors have direct access to trusted financial advice, at preferential rates. Get in touch for more.

5 Questions with Chris Tremlett

We asked Source Director and retired England cricketer, Chris Tremlett, 5 questions about his sports career, move to property investment and his best advice for new investors.

Read the full blog post here.

Mumbai Trip

In March, Tom and Chris visited Mumbai for the first time since retiring from cricket.

Highlights of the trip were meeting clients in-person, some incredible authentic food and watching the Mumbai Indians vs Rajasthan Royals IPL match.

Both plan to return later this year and look forward to seeing everyone again.

 

That's all for now.

Please get in touch with the team to discuss our new property investments.  

 
Contact Us
